author: LukasEbeling
body: This is a back port for PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49620 to release `16_0_X`. This PR modifies the L1 emulator code for the topological trigger. The revised model uses 'hwQual' as well as `etaAtVtx` and `phiAtVtx` as input features (see PR [#2](https://github.com/cms-hls4ml/TOPO/pull/2) This PR adds the preprocessing of these input features to the L1 emulator code. Very well agreement between emulator output score and qkeras model score:
title: L1 Emulator for revised model of topological trigger targeting hh->bbWW (single muon final state), Backport 16_0_X
